title: visuelle kommunikation expo Typeface
content:
Hi guys.  
Wondering if anyone can ID this display face on this german design expo poster.  
Or anything similar to it.  
Greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202022902im_/http:/typophile.com/files/exp1_4502.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [exp1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202022902/http:/typophile.com/files/exp1.jpg) | 38.9 KB |

 [‹ Benchmark](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202022902/http:/typophile.com/node/52081 "Go to previous forum topic") [spiderman movie poster ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202022902/http:/typophile.com/node/52247 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mnkyben

comments.content: this may be an assembly of constructed shapes rather than an actual typeface. maybe – hopefully – it was thrown together for this poster only?
Ive seen a few slight variations on this around the place but I just cant find anything...
Ive seen a few slight variations on this around the place but I just cant find anything...
